title: Their Lee Sin and Our Lee Sin

replies.body: There was a bug with his ward-dash and he bounced of the wall.
Yeah, the bug is that hes allowd to ward dash at all, such a stupid mechanic.

Lee would not be lee without his ability to jump over the walls though.


Even though i dislike it i´d still miss it if it disappeared.

Right, not like he has other abilities that can move him over walls, clealry he needs to have an ability that has been taken away form other champions and called toxic for gameplay, but its lee sin so its 100% fine right?  Nothing about lee has ever been toxic, unfun, or unfair to play against, like his base 350 movespeed, 3 movement abilities, or his Q that for no reason deals extremely high base damage AND missing HP damage...

But its lee sin, so its fine, somehow has to make those LCS plays that 99% of players dont give a flying fuck about, right?  Lee sin.

Jax still keeps the same ability, and the only one who lost it was kata i think? Maybe Braum had it for a while too.


And lee trades it down because he´s weak if he doesn't get a lead, he can't just powerfarm and get strong.


Not to mention the % missing health damage only applies on champ collision, meaning it doesn't really help him snowball.


And he´s among the squishiest melee champions there are too, and his stat growth isn't anything impressive either.


Only interesting thing about him is his mobility and early game, which are used to snowball and try to end early or he will probably lose unless his team is strong.

That's why hardly anyone cares about lee.
